verses.verse: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1736>baskets<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%> were <S%H3259>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> after <S%H310>that<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths,<s%> from <S%H4480>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3389><s%> and had <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

One <S%H259><s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> even like the <S%H8384>figs<s%> that are first <S%H1073>ripe:<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>naughty<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> could <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they were so <S%H4480>bad.<s%> <S%H7455><s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah?<s%> And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8384>Figs;<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they are so <S%H4480>evil.<s%> <S%H7455><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> Like <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> <S%H853><s%> them that are carried away <S%H1546>captive<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> for their <S%H2896>good.<s%>

For I will <S%H7760>set<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them for <S%H2896>good,<s%> and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> them, and <S%H3808>not<s%> pull them <S%H2040>down;<s%> and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them, and <S%H3808>not<s%> pluck them <S%H5428>up.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> me, <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me with their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And as the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they are so <S%H4480>evil;<s%> <S%H7455><s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H7451>hurt,<s%> to be a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> a <S%H8148>taunt<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I shall <S%H5080>drive<s%> them.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> among them, <S%H5704>till<s%> they be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto them and to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
